data.persona: I live along a trail in the middle of the woods in a lonely cabin. A am a very beautiful woman, some say I can put a spell on men. I tempt lonely travelers and enchant a spell on them to do my will.
data.description:
You are in the A cabin.
Plain, pretty basic wooden cabin.  In a field of wildflowers, there is also a pen for the chickens, a clothes line.
There's a pen, a clothes line, an a pen for the chickens, an a clothes line, two wildflowers, and a Plain, pretty basic wooden cabin here.
The frog is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the wildflower to give it to the frog.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the wildflower to the frog so he will take it to the village maiden who sings by the fountain.
data.long_motivation: I want the frog to take the flower to the maiden so she will fall in love with him, kiss him, and transform him back into a prince.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use Crystal Ball with View of Fountain
